n: Bacon Wrapped Brown Sugar Smokies Dipping Sauce
des: "I love this site's recipe for Bacon Wrapped Smokies/Brown Sugar Smokies.  One of the recipe reviewers suggests a dipping sauce that consists of mayo, brown sugar and chili sauce, I didn't have any chili sauce on hand, so I substituted with regular BBQ sauce, with this as the result.  Amount of ingredients is approximate, measure to your own taste."
ins: Stir together mayonnaise, barbeque sauce, and brown sugar in a small bowl until the brown sugar has dissolved.
